background_description: The background depicts a vibrant coral reef environment with clear blue water. Various branching and plate-like coral structures, predominantly in shades of light blue and purple, are visible. Numerous small, reddish-orange fish swim scattered in the mid-to-far background.
explanation: The image features a dark-bodied Black Triggerfish with distinct white lines on its fins, swimming prominently in the foreground. Its deep purple/black coloration provides a high contrast against the bright blue water and the light-colored coral reef, making it stand out clearly without any apparent camouflage.
